name: RepeatAfterMe
0:
”Alexa, ask repeat after me to say Hello it's me”
”Repeat goodbye”
”Say I love you”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: repeat after me
des:
This skill will repeat anything you say to Alexa. 

"Repeat hello"
"Say cantaloupe"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
